00025 #ifndef _PHYSICS_SLIDERJOINT_
00026 #define _PHYSICS_SLIDERJOINT_
00027 
00028 #include <physics/physics>
00029 #include <physics/Joint>
00030 
00031 
00032 namespace physics {
00033 
00034 
00035 class SliderJoint : virtual public Joint
00036 {
00037 public:
00038   SliderJoint() {}
00039   virtual ~SliderJoint() {}
00040 
00041   virtual void    setAxis(const Vector3& p) = 0; ///< body1 relative
00042   virtual Vector3 getAxis() const = 0;
00043   
00044   virtual Real    getPosition() const = 0;
00045   virtual Real    getPositionRate() const = 0;
00046 
00047   virtual void   setHighStop(Real pos) = 0; ///< upper joint stop 
00048   virtual void   setLowStop(Real pos) = 0;  ///< lower joint stop 
00049   virtual void   setStopRestitution(Real r) = 0; ///< 'bouncyness' of the stops (0..1)
00050 
00051 };
00052 
00053 
00054 } // physics
00055 
00056 #endif
